title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Everyday we hear about war Like everyday we heard Bout covid.I think people Are tired and let's take new subject.The war between ukraine and russia are only their own war rest of the world Are in NATO Alliance and protected against war for that reason.Same destiny await sweden finland and moldova countries becouse they have no protection.It's Like you own store without security then you think nobody dont come to steal.There is too many news about war nowdays nobody dont like war or any news about war.To be honest the current war is not our business at all.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: The war is almost over. Ukraine can't take much more. Probably the new funding from the US that is coming, will be its last.Scott Ritter & Dan Kovalik: Ukraine Last Stand??https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iJGWQWRJB-w

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 29, 2022, 01:15:53 PM-cut-To be honest the current war is not our business at all.-cut-That's insane claim. Just because you don't want to hear about it it's happening. And that insanity happens right on my backdoor. Naturally Russia doesn't want that we would talk about it, they even put people to prison because they called it as a war. And that should be enough of reason for people to keep talking about the war crimes that are currently happening. The fact that you try to silence others because you are tired of it, doesn't mean anything in any scale. It just shows lack of empathy from your part.

comments.author: Swordsoffreedom
comments.body: Quote from: o48o on December 29, 2022, 03:55:19 PMQuote from: Fullbear2222 on December 29, 2022, 01:15:53 PM-cut-To be honest the current war is not our business at all.-cut-That's insane claim. Just because you don't want to hear about it it's happening. And that insanity happens right on my backdoor. Naturally Russia doesn't want that we would talk about it, they even put people to prison because they called it as a war. And that should be enough of reason for people to keep talking about the war crimes that are currently happening. The fact that you try to silence others because you are tired of it, doesn't mean anything in any scale. It just shows lack of empathy from your part.I don't see the OP saying anything that he is pro-Russia or pro-war, but I disagree that war doesn't affect us. I don't live in 2 countries that are at war, but what I'm going through, like high commodity prices, energy crisis, and economic crisis that I'm going through is partly caused by war. I'm following all the war news because I want this to end and don't want to think that our generation will see World War 3. That's really terrible every time I think about it.OP, one more thing, Nato is not as pacifist as you think, the head of NATO is the one who caused this war.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: The war will end. It might even end soon. The major reason for the US being in the war is going away. Without this reason, the US will have no reason to stay in Ukraine. If they do, they will quit funding Ukraine, and Russia will win the war. It's starting since before Christmas.Russia claims U.S. moving bioweapons research facilities out of Ukrainehttps://www.naturalnews.com/2022-12-28-russia-claims-u-s-moving-bioweapons-research-out-of-ukraine.htmlFor Americans who are confused about why U.S. politicians and the West, in general, are so hell-bent on helping Ukraine beat back Russia’s invasion — and are convinced that it is something more than just to hide Biden family corruption in the country — Russian officials have just provided the explanation.It seems as though Ukraine is home to bioweapons research facilities, which Moscow says are now being relocated to other countries in Asia and eastern Europe, Russia Today reported, quoting state officials:Washington has been moving its bioweapons research out of Ukraine, the head of Russia’s Nuclear Biological and Chemical Defense Troops has claimed. This comes after the research laboratories’ existence was exposed under the Trump presidency. “The Pentagon is actively working to transfer its unfinished research projects to the countries in Central Asia and Eastern Europe,” Igor Kirillov claimed during a briefing over the Christmas weekend.In addition, he says, the Biden regime has been increasing its cooperation with Cambodia, Thailand, Singapore, Kenya, and other countries in Africa as well as the Indo-Pacific, with “the US Department of Defense being most interested in countries that already possess laboratories with a high level of bio?ontainment,” he added.According to Kirillov, information about illegal American-backed labs in Ukraine was given to the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons conference, which met in Geneva between Nov. 28 and Dec. 16.The information included “documentary evidence that work with components of biological weapons and studies of pathogens of especially dangerous and economically significant infections had been carried out on the territory of Ukraine with financial, scientific, technical and personnel support of the U.S.,” he said.RT.com noted further: ...

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: Don't tell what I should do I won't tell where you have to go.You're tired to read about war? Oh no, what a huge first world problem... Solution - skip news about war, don't read it, but don't tell what other people should do. You're tired to read news, while people are tired to live more than 10 months under constant bombing, living in cold without electricity and heating. I'm not even talking about losing family members, home. And you're just tired to read news about war.Quote from: Swordsoffreedom on December 29, 2022, 04:16:23 PMOP, one more thing, Nato is not as pacifist as you think, the head of NATO is the one who caused this war.And offcourse, it's not Putin's fault and he isn't the one who caused this war...
